Uses of Interface
sx.blah.discord.api.IDiscordClient

  • Packages that use IDiscordClient 
    Package Description
    sx.blah.discord.api
    This package contains all Discord4J-related apis.
    sx.blah.discord.api.events
    The classes in this package relate to the Discord4J event system.
    sx.blah.discord.api.internal
    This package contains all internal Discord4J apis.
    sx.blah.discord.handle.impl.obj
    This package contains all the implemented versions of Discord objects.
    sx.blah.discord.handle.obj
    This contains the interfaces Discord4J users directly interact with.
    sx.blah.discord.modules
    This package contains everything relating to Discord4J "modules".
    sx.blah.discord.util
    This package contains utilities for dealing with the Discord api.

      Methods in sx.blah.discord.api that return IDiscordClient 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      IDiscordClient ClientBuilder.build()
      Creates the discord instance with the desired features
      IDiscordClient IShard.getClient()
      Gets the client this shard is managed by.
      IDiscordClient ClientBuilder.login()
      Performs ClientBuilder.build() and logs in automatically
